thread.title: Stayed for a convention and felt taken care of!
thread.title_full: Stayed for a convention and felt taken care of! - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Raquel G
title: Stayed for a convention and felt taken care of!
text: We stayed for a conference and we enjoyed every minute of this hotel. The rooms were clean and up to date in style. One little thing that made me cringe was the public bathrooms downstairs...the stall door would slam. It was loud and you feel like you have to apologize if someone else is in the bathroom. Well because you don't want to seem like you are pissed that you had to wait. We all did get a laugh out of it tho!
